title: If garen gets over 70% win rate in urf...
body: We need to either revert the W (or triple the cooldown) or remove him from URF all together. He's not fun or fair to play against.

replies.body: Dude, it's an alternate game mode. Most champs are dumb as fuck to play against.  It's expected, if you don't like the game mode (like myself) don't play it.

revert or nerf the w? lmao.

lets nerf a champion because hes op in a fucking gamemode where nothing is balanced and everything is op. are you high?

There's actually a solid amount of balance. Just read the URF bonus stats. (other than the 80% CDR, yes, there's more.) 
IT's not because he's op or whatever, it's because he ruins the gamemode for the other team. If he breaks too high of a winrate, it then becomes toxic and needs to be corrected.
This is why they made it all random, and they're not going to do anything else about this matter. They only change champions who can perma stun like Brand used to in the first URF

{{champion:13}} ? No? Okay.

{{champion:17}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:38}} There are several other champions who have been nerfed/adjusted due to their dominance. Try again moron.

You must be that guy that complains about everything, nothing is good enough.

You go to the boards to cry about winrate for URF when it's random. Are things that hard for you?

What I'm saying is if garens winrate gets to 70~ % then he's the one carrying his own victories. And when you're up against something you can only win against 3/10 times, it's no longer fun. In the interests of keeping the game from being too toxic nerfing such an instance would be more than warranted....

> [{quoted}](name=LatetotheRace,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ats0EIAf,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-08-13T01:25:31.573+0000)
>
> {{champion:13}} ? No? Okay.
> 
> {{champion:17}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:38}} There are several other champions who have been nerfed/adjusted due to their dominance. Try again moron.

Ryze and Karthus are permabanned from normal urf. Like, Riot has them disabled for normal URF because of how broken they were. Doesn't change the fact that characters like Syndra, Morgana, Brand, Vel'Koz, Gangplank(1 second parrrley), and a lot of champs are busted as hell in URF, and would be picked non stop.
Yes, I am aware of all the changes made to champions in URF ever since its debut. I just brought up one example. And you better fix your attitude kid, I'm not your friend.
The issue with Garen is his E is more or less dealing double damage. He is fine, just bugged.
